statements: UPDATE phylogenetic_analysis SET mutation_rate = 0.05, evolutionary_distance = 0.2 WHERE species_name = 'Homo sapiens';
UPDATE phylogenetic_analysis SET evolutionary_distance = 0.5, mutation_rate = 0.08 WHERE species_name = 'Pan troglodytes';
UPDATE phylogenetic_analysis SET mutation_rate = 0.005, evolutionary_distance = 0.02 WHERE species_name = 'Homo sapiens';
UPDATE phylogenetic_analysis SET genetic_sequence = 'ATGCATCGATCGATCG', mutation_rate = 0.002 WHERE species_name = 'Escherichia coli';
UPDATE phylogenetic_analysis SET sequence_data = 'AAAAA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE evolutionary_relationships SET similarity_score = 0.75, relationship_type = 'ancestor' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE phylogenetic_analysis SET sequence_data = 'ATGCATGC' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE evolutionary_relationships SET similarity_score = 0.85, relationship_type = 'sibling' WHERE species1_name = 'Homo sapiens' AND species2_name = 'Pan troglodytes';
UPDATE Species SET species_name = 'Dog', species_type = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE Phylogeny SET evolutionary_distance = 0.75, genus_id = 2 WHERE phylogeny_id = 3;
UPDATE Species SET species_name = 'Lion', species_type = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE Phylogeny SET evolutionary_distance = 0.5 WHERE species_id = 1 AND genus_id = 2;
UPDATE Species SET species_name = 'Elephant', species_type = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE PhylogeneticTree SET tree_description = 'This tree represents the evolutionary relationships of birds' WHERE tree_id = 3;
UPDATE Species SET species_name = 'Human', species_type = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE PhylogeneticTree SET tree_description = 'This tree is about mammals' WHERE tree_id = 1;
UPDATE Species SET species_name = 'Lion', species_type = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1
UPDATE Genus SET founding_year = 1750, genus_name = 'Panthera' WHERE genus_id = 2
UPDATE Species SET species_name = 'Tiger', species_type = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE Genus SET founding_year = 1850, genus_name = 'Felidae' WHERE genus_id = 3;
